subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 38 points, Michael Beasley made two free throws with 9.2 seconds left to put host Miami up for good, and the Heat beat the Atlanta Hawks, 121-119.
snippet: LeBron James scored 38 points, Michael Beasley made two free throws with 9.2 seconds left to put host Miami up for good, and the Heat beat the Atlanta Hawks, 121-119.
